channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 7 Pro-Life Protections GOP Congress Should Demand In Addition To The Hyde Amendment
item.description: The time to pass the Hyde Amendment and several other pro-life protections is now, while the GOP controls both chambers and the White House.

item.title: American Identity Isn’t Just A ‘Creed,’ It’s A People And A Place
item.description: If America is to survive, we must stop defending a 'proposition' and start defending a home.

item.title: In An Attempt To Smear Trump The Left Is Butchering Ancient History
item.description: A WaPo column attempting to draw a line from Sparta to Hitler to Trump twists reality and falls flat on its face in the process.

item.title: Here’s Why Democrats Are Subjugating Themselves To Somalis In Humiliation Rituals

item.description: Michael Reagan, the eldest son of President Ronald Reagan and a conservative commentator, has died. He was 80.
